name: September 2022
title: September 2022
body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IAM/pages/3723034633 - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

Table of Contents

    • Sign-In Widget, version 6.7.0
      • Okta ADFS plugin, version 1.7.11
        • Okta MFA Credential Provider for Windows, version 1.3.7
          • PKCE validation for OIDC app integrations
          • Validation and verification of signed SAML requests
          • Shared SWA app accounts, password restriction
          • LDAP real-time synchronization
          • Improved status updates for AD-sourced users
          • New Recent Activity page on the new Okta end-user dashboard
          • Custom domain status
          • Visual improvements on the Admin Dashboard
          • OIN Manager user interface changes
          • 403 error for rate limit violations
          • Step-up authentication using ACR values is EA in Preview
          • API for suppressing email notifications is in General Availability
          • Access Denied error message customization is GA in Preview
          • Dynamic IdP routing is GA in Preview

See: https://help.okta.com/en-us/Content/Topics/ReleaseNotes/archive/oce-relnotes-2022.htm

Feature

Remark

Sign-In Widget, version 6.7.0

no update needed, take changes into account when updating

Okta ADFS plugin, version 1.7.11

not in use

Okta MFA Credential Provider for Windows, version 1.3.7

not in use

PKCE validation for OIDC app integrations

currently not in use, should think about this later on or when using a new identity provider

Validation and verification of signed SAML requests

nice to have, keep in mind when hitting issues with signed SAML requests

Shared SWA app accounts, password restriction

irrelevant

LDAP real-time synchronization

not in use

Improved status updates for AD-sourced users

not in use

New Recent Activity page on the new Okta end-user dashboard

nice to have, no adaption needed

Custom domain status

nice to have, no adaption needed

Visual improvements on the Admin Dashboard

irrelevant

OIN Manager user interface changes

irrelevant

403 error for rate limit violations

irrelevant as SMS only

API

Step-up authentication using ACR values is EA in Preview

could be a new feature in our solutions, no adaption needed right away

API for suppressing email notifications is in General Availability

nice to have, no adaption needed, possibly should be configured once for our templates

Access Denied error message customization is GA in Preview

nice to have, no adaption needed

Dynamic IdP routing is GA in Preview

nice to have, could be configured, no adaption needed right away
